scripts.build:all: npm run build:website && npm run build:extension
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:website && npm run install:extension
scripts.clean: npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:locks
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build:all
scripts.reset:hard: npm run clean && npm cache clean --force && npm run install:all && npm run build:all
scripts.docker:reset: npm run docker:clean && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up
scripts.fresh: npm run reset:hard && npm run docker:reset
scripts.nuke: npm run clean && npm cache clean --force && npm run docker:clean
